data.title: Our Management Team
data.meta_description: At Vaughn Interior Concepts, our outstanding team works hard to provide your organization, business, or home with the best quality workmanship possible.
data.text:
At Vaughn Interior Concepts, our outstanding team works diligently to provide your organization, business, or home with the best quality work possible. Meet our team:

Maureen Vaughn President

Prior to starting Vaughn Interior Concepts, Inc., she co-founded Clipper Courier Logistics with her husband Ron Vaughn. She attended OSU, Wright State and Sinclair.

Craig Vaughn Executive VP

Prior to his starting Vaughn Interior Concepts, Inc., he worked as the National Project Manager for the Midmark Corporation in their Casework Division. He studied at Bowling Green State University where he earned a BS in Construction Management / Civil Engineering. He served in the US Air Force and Reserves from 1986-1998. He has been in the construction industry for over 25 years.

Josh Vaughn Project Manager

Josh attended Chaminade-Julienne HS and then attended BGSU where he studied International Business, while working for Clipper Courier Delivery during the summers and holiday breaks before starting his employment with Vaughn Interior Concepts, in 1995. Josh started as an installer and then worked up to sales/estimating. He is now the lead estimator/project manager.

Greg Pinson General Manager, ACC

General Manager of American Casework Co., our in-house manufacturing group since 2011. Prior to that Greg was the Production Manager from 1998 â€“ 2011. He was employed in 1996 with us as a Custom Fabricator. Greg has a total of 30 years in Architectural Millwork. He served in the US Army.

Brad Cable Production Manager
